dsOverview.title: Boulder, CO Strong Downslope Wind Events of 1969

summary.p: This dataset contains wind speed, direction, and gust data for Boulder, Colorado during strong downsloping wind events in 1969.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section,Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Winds > Surface Winds
